title: Goldenglow Estate: 'Loud and Clear' Heist Complete

updates.current_objective: Thieves Guild: Debrief Mercer on the Goldenglow job and brace for Maven's next demand. Keep pursuing Arisann's Pale lead from the safe papers.
world_consequences.major_choices: Executed the Goldenglow Estate heist for the Thieves Guild: infiltrated silently, cleared Aringoth's safe, and delivered the take to Mercer.
Left Maven a message in smoke: three beehives burned at Goldenglow, pinning blame on 'unseen hands' rather than witnesses.
Recovered a Pale-linked paper trail from the safe that may intersect with Arisann's disappearance.

changes.notes: Gold increased by 600g from Guild payout. Two new items recovered from Goldenglow safe.
Thieves Guild trust increased from 4 (Ally) to 7 (Champion) for clean execution of Goldenglow heist.
Arisann search clock advanced significantly (+3) due to Pale-linked shipping note. Rift respect clock advanced (+1) due to successful heist reputation.

major_events: Goldenglow Estate sabotaged: beehives burned; Aringoth's safe robbed
